game.name: Project: Latticeborn
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A fast-paced 3D survival action roguelite. Upgrade your Bastion, forge shard-powered weapons, and battle through chaotic procedural arenas as an expendable Shardborn. Build, fight, die, and grow stronger each run.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced 3D survival action roguelite. Upgrade your Bastion, forge shard-powered weapons, and battle through chaotic procedural arenas as an expendable Shardborn. Build, fight, die, and grow stronger each run.
